relief_area: Rehabilitation of Families Affected by Slum Demolition

title: RESCUE EFFORTS
paras: We helped with efforts of local NGOs and activist groups to rescue laborers working as bonded labor in brick kilns. We also further sponsored their travel to their homes. We were able to amplify these stories and arrange timely support for rescued workers.

We rescued around 50 migrantsworkers including families from the road in the middle of night. They were stuck in a brickkiln in Haryana's Hisar, weren't being paid, didn't have enough food nor proper arrangements for reaching home was made for them.
